Ability.Name: Pillar of Frost
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_Pillar = PQ_Pillar local PQ_PlagueStrike = PQ_PlagueStrike local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
if PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_Pillar) and PQ_CD and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(PQ_PlagueStrike), "target") == 1 then
if PQ_HasEngineering == true then RunMacroText("/use 10") end
CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_Pillar), "player") return true end

Ability.Name: Raise Dead
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_RaiseDead = PQ_RaiseDead local PQ_PlagueStrike = PQ_PlagueStrike local SpecialUnit = SpecialUnit
if PQ_CanCast and PQ_CD and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_RaiseDead) and (SpecialUnit() or PQ_CD == CD_Auto) and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(PQ_PlagueStrike), "target") == 1 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_RaiseDead), "player")
if PQ_Has2MinCD == true then for _,spell in ipairs(PQ_2MinCDList) do if IsSpellKnown(spell) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(spell), "player") end end end
return true end

Ability.Name: Empower Rune Weapon
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_Empower = PQ_Empower
if PQ_CanCast and (UseCD == true or UseCDBoss == true) and UnholyRunes == 0 and DeathRunes == 0 and FrostRunes == 0 and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_Empower) and SpecialUnit() then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_Empower), "player") return true end

Ability.Name: [Misc] Init
Ability.Lua:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Variables & Sanity checks ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Load LUA data files. if PQR_RotationStarted then PQR_RotationStarted = false
PQR_UI = "Blizzard" -- Options: Blizzard, ElvUI --/run print( GetMouseFocus():GetName() or 'unknown' )
if PQR_UI == "ElvUI" then PQR_OverrideActionBarButton1 = "ElvUI_Bar1Button1" PQR_OverrideActionBarButton2 = "ElvUI_Bar1Button2" elseif PQR_UI == "Blizzard" then PQR_OverrideActionBarButton1 = "OverrideActionBarButton1" PQR_OverrideActionBarButton2 = "OverrideActionBarButton2" else PQR_OverrideActionBarButton1 = "OverrideActionBarButton1" PQR_OverrideActionBarButton2 = "OverrideActionBarButton2" end
if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_Frost_DW_Wey_Data.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("|cffb73737You're missing PQR_Frost_DW_Wey_Data.lua - Make sure it's in your Data folder! The Rotation has been halted.|cffffffff", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end
if not PQ_DKLoaded then -- Create Frame if not PQ_Frame then PQ_Frame = CreateFrame("Frame") PQ_Frame:RegisterEvent("UNIT_SPELLCAST_SUCCEEDED") PQ_Frame:SetScript("OnEvent", PQ_Frame_OnEvent) PQ_Frame:Show() end
-- Check for 2 Min CD for _,spell in ipairs(PQ_2MinCDList) do if IsSpellKnown(spell) then PQ_Has2MinCD = true break end end
RunMacroText("/use 10")
PQ_DKLoaded = true end end
if IsMounted() then return true end if PQ_CanCast == false and PQ_GCD <= GetTime() then PQ_CanCast = true end if PQ_CanBT == false and PQ_BTCD <= GetTime() then PQ_CanBT = true end if PQ_CanImpalingSpear == false and PQ_ImpalingSpearCD <= GetTime() then PQ_CanImpalingSpear = true end
RunicPower = UnitPower("player") PlayerHp = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") TargetHp = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
-- Rune checks BloodRunes = 0 UnholyRunes = 0 FrostRunes = 0 DeathRunes = 0 FullyDepleted = 0
for i=1,6,2 do local type = GetRuneType(i) local type2 = GetRuneType(i+1)
local cd = select(3, GetRuneCooldown(i)) local cd2 = select(3, GetRuneCooldown(i+1))
if FullyDepleted == 0 and cd == false and cd2 == false then FullyDepleted = 1 end
if cd == true then if type == 2 then UnholyRunes = UnholyRunes + 1 elseif type == 3 then FrostRunes = FrostRunes + 1 elseif i == 1 then BloodRunes = BloodRunes + 1 else DeathRunes = DeathRunes + 1 end end
if cd2 == true then if type2 == 2 then UnholyRunes = UnholyRunes + 1 elseif type2 == 3 then FrostRunes = FrostRunes + 1 elseif i == 1 then BloodRunes = BloodRunes + 1 else DeathRunes = DeathRunes + 1 end end end

Ability.Name: [Misc] Pause
Ability.Lua:
local PlayerCombat = UnitAffectingCombat("player")
if IsMounted() or not PlayerCombat or UnitInVehicle("player") or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") or (PauseEnabled == true and PQI:IsHotkeys(PauseKey)) or PlayerHasBuff(30024) -- Drinking or PlayerHasBuff(104934) -- Eating then return true end

Ability.Name: Death and Decay
Ability.Lua: local PQ_HowlingBlast = PQ_HowlingBlast local PQ_DnD = PQ_DnD if UseDnD ~= true then return false end if PQ_CanCast and PQI:IsHotkeys(UseDnDKey) and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_DnD) and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(PQ_HowlingBlast), "target") == 1 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_DnD),nil) if SpellIsTargeting() then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: Horn of Winter
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_Horn = PQ_Horn
if PQ_CanCast and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_Horn) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_Horn), "player") return true end

Ability.Name: Frost Strike (RP > 76)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_FrostStrike = PQ_FrostStrike local TargetValidationMelee = TargetValidationMelee
if PQ_CanCast and TargetValidationMelee("target", PQ_FrostStrike) and RunicPower > 76 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_FrostStrike), "target") return true end

Ability.Name: Howling Blast (Rime)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_HowlingBlast = PQ_HowlingBlast local PQ_Rime = PQ_Rime local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
if PQ_CanCast and PQ_HB and UnitBuffID("player", PQ_Rime) and TargetValidation("target", PQ_HowlingBlast) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_HowlingBlast), "target") return true end

Ability.Name: Howling Blast (no debuff)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_HowlingBlast = PQ_HowlingBlast local PQ_FrostFever = PQ_FrostFever local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
if UnitBuffID("player", PQ_UnholyBlight) then return false end
if PQ_CanCast and PQ_OutbreakCD - GetTime() > 5 -- Outbreak is more than 5 seconds on CD and PQ_HB and not UnitDebuffID("target", PQ_FrostFever, "player") and TargetValidation("target", PQ_HowlingBlast) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_HowlingBlast), "target") return true end

Ability.Name: Plague Strike (no debuff)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_PlagueStrike = PQ_PlagueStrike local PQ_BloodPlague = PQ_BloodPlague local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
if UnitBuffID("player", PQ_UnholyBlight) then return false end
if PQ_CanCast and PQ_OutbreakCD - GetTime() > 5 -- Outbreak is more than 5 seconds on CD and not UnitDebuffID("target", PQ_BloodPlague, "player") and TargetValidation("target", PQ_PlagueStrike) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_PlagueStrike), "target") PQ_ShouldPestilence = true return true end

Ability.Name: Outbreak
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_FrostFever = PQ_FrostFever local PQ_BloodPlague = PQ_BloodPlague local PQ_Outbreak = PQ_Outbreak local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
if PQ_CanCast == false then return false end
local FF,_,_,_,_,_,FFtimer = UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_FrostFever,"player") local BP,_,_,_,_,_,BPtimer = UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_BloodPlague,"player")
if BP and FF then if (FFtimer - GetTime() < 3 or BPtimer - GetTime() < 3) and TargetValidation("target", PQ_Outbreak) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_Outbreak), "target") PQ_ShouldPestilence = true return true end else if TargetValidation("target", PQ_Outbreak) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_Outbreak), "target") PQ_ShouldPestilence = true return true end end

Ability.Name: Debug
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_PlagueStrike = PQ_PlagueStrike local PQ_RaiseDead = PQ_RaiseDead local SpecialUnit = SpecialUnit
if PQ_CanCast and PQ_CD and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_RaiseDead) and (SpecialUnit() or PQ_CD == CD_Auto) and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(PQ_PlagueStrike), "target") == 1 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_RaiseDead), "player")
if PQ_Has2MinCD == true then for _,spell in ipairs(PQ_2MinCDList) do if IsSpellKnown(spell) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(spell), "player") end end end
return true end

Ability.Name: Plague Leech
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_PlagueLeech = PQ_PlagueLeech local PQ_FrostFever = PQ_FrostFever local PQ_BloodPlague = PQ_BloodPlague local PQ_Outbreak = PQ_Outbreak local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
if PQ_CanCast == false then return false end if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_PlagueLeech) then return false end if FullyDepleted == 0 or not IsSpellKnown(PQ_PlagueLeech) then return false end
local FF,_,_,_,_,_,FFtimer = UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_FrostFever,"player") local BP,_,_,_,_,_,BPtimer = UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_BloodPlague,"player")
if FF and BP and TargetValidation("target", PQ_PlagueLeech) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_PlagueLeech), "target") return true end

Ability.Name: Blood Tap (Soul Reaper)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_BloodTap = PQ_BloodTap local PQ_SoulReaper = PQ_SoulReaper local PQ_BloodCharge = PQ_BloodCharge
if FullyDepleted == 0 or not IsSpellKnown(PQ_BloodTap) then return false end
if TargetHp <= 35 then local charges = select(4, UnitBuffID("player", PQ_BloodCharge))
if PQ_CanBT and charges and charges >= 5 and PQ_SoulReaperCD <= GetTime() then PQ_BTCD = GetTime() + 0.1 PQ_CanBT = false CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_BloodTap), "player") return true end end

Ability.Name: Soul Reaper
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_SoulReaper = PQ_SoulReaper local TargetValidationMelee = TargetValidationMelee
if PQ_CanCast and TargetHp <= 35 and TargetValidationMelee("target", PQ_SoulReaper) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SoulReaper), "target") return true end

Ability.Name: Pestilence
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_Pestilence = PQ_Pestilence local PQ_FrostFever = PQ_FrostFever local PQ_BloodPlague = PQ_BloodPlague local TargetValidationMelee = TargetValidationMelee
if PQ_CanCast and PQ_ShouldPestilence == true and UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_FrostFever,"player") and UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_BloodPlague,"player") and TargetValidationMelee("target", PQ_Pestilence) then -- SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_Pestilence), "target") return true end

Ability.Name: Selfheal
Ability.Lua:
--if PlayerHP <= 50 then -- if TargetValidationMelee("target", PQ_DeathStrike) then -- CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_DeathStrike), "target") -- return true -- end --end
if PlayerHP <= 45 then local _,ghoul = GetTotemInfo(1) local PQ_DeathPact = PQ_DeathPact
if ghoul ~= nil and ghoul ~= "" and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_DeathPact) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_DeathPact), "player") return true end
if PlayerHP <= 90 and UnitBuffID("player", PQ_DarkSuccor) then if TargetValidationMelee("target", PQ_DeathStrike) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_DeathStrike), "target") return true end end
local PQ_HealthStoneItem = PQ_HealthStoneItem
if PlayerHP <= 50 and GetItemCount(PQ_HealthStoneItem,false,true) > 0 and GetItemCooldown(PQ_HealthStoneItem) == 0 then UseItemByName(PQ_HealthStoneItem, "player") return true end
--Potion Counts --local tvPot = GetItemCount(76089) --Virmen's Bite --local vPot = GetItemCount(76093) --Potion of the Jade Serpent --local gbPot = GetItemCount(76095) --Potion of Mogu Power --local ePot = GetItemCount(76090) --Potion of the Mountains local mhPot = GetItemCount(76097) --Master Healing Potion --Potion timers --local tvCD = GetItemCooldown(76089) --Virmen's Bite Timer --local vCD = GetItemCooldown(76093) --Potion of the Jade Serpant Timer --local gbCD = GetItemCooldown(76095) --Potion of Mogu Power Timer --local eCD = GetItemCooldown(76090) --Potion of the Mountains Timer local mhCD = GetItemCooldown(76097) --Master Healing Potion
if PlayerHP <= 35 and mhCount >= 1 and mhCD == 0 UseItemByName(76097, "player") return true end end

Ability.Name: [Misc] Bossmod
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_IcyTouch = PQ_IcyTouch local PQ_ImpalingSpear = PQ_ImpalingSpear local PQ_AMS = PQ_AMS local TryPurge = true
--Implement PQR_resumeAttack.. this is used to prevent --abilities lower in the rotation from being cast. if PQR_resumeAttack == nil then PQR_resumeAttack = 0 elseif PQR_resumeAttack > GetTime() then return true else PQR_resumeAttack = 0 end
--IMPORTANT: Change this if you have any cleaves that would do damage to a secondary target --as part of your single target rotation. Better to be safe than sorry! --Used for : Spirit Kings local cleaveClass = true local isAOE = strmatch(strupper(PQR_RotationName), "AOE") --checks if we are in AOE mode.
for i=1,4 do local bossCheck = "boss"..i
if UnitExists(bossCheck) then local npcID = tonumber(UnitGUID(bossCheck):sub(6,10), 16) local bossCasting,_,_,_,_,castEnd = UnitCastingInfo(bossCheck) local icyPurge = GlyphCheck(58631)
------------------------------------------------------------ ----------------------- Tier 14 Raids ---------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------
if npcID == 62837 then -- Grand Empress Shek'zeer
local vision = select(7, UnitDebuffID("player", 124862)) -- Vision of Demise
if vision and vision - GetTime() <= 2 and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_AMS) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_AMS), "player") return true end
if PQ_PlayerRace == "Human" and UnitDebuffID("player", 124863) -- Vision of Demise Proc and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_EveryManForHimself) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_EveryManForHimself), "player") return true end
elseif npcID == 62397 then -- Wind Lord Mel'jarak local mending = GetSpellInfo(122193)
if UnitExists("focus") then local impalingDebuff = select(7, UnitDebuffID("focus", PQ_ImpalingSpear, "player"))
if impalingDebuff and impalingDebuff - GetTime() < 5 then if PQ_CanCast and PQ_CanImpalingSpear then if GetSpellInfo(PQ_ImpalingSpear) == UnitCastingInfo("player") then return true -- pause rotation while casting Impaling Spear end RunMacroText("/target [@focus]") RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") RunMacroText("/targetlasttarget") return true end end
if UnitCastingInfo("focus") == mending and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_MindFreeze) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_MindFreeze), "focus") return true end end
if UnitCastingInfo("target") == mending and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_MindFreeze) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_MindFreeze), "target") return true end
if UnitExists("mouseover") and UnitCastingInfo("mouseover") == mending and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_MindFreeze) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_MindFreeze), "mouseover") return true end
if PQ_PlayerRace == "Human" and UnitDebuffID("player", 121885) -- Amber Prison and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_EveryManForHimself) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_EveryManForHimself), "player") return true end
elseif npcID == 62983 then -- Lei Shi
if UnitBuffID("target", 123250) and UnitIsUnit("target", bossCheck) then return true end
elseif npcID == 60583 or npcID == 60583 or npcID == 60585 then -- Protectors
local prison = select(7, UnitDebuffID("player", 111850)) -- Lightning Prison
if prison and prison - GetTime() <= 2 and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_AMS) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_AMS), "player") return true end
if PQ_PlayerRace == "Human" and UnitDebuffID("player", 117436) -- Lightning Prison and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_EveryManForHimself) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_EveryManForHimself), "player") return true end
if PQ_CanCast and icyPurge == true and UnitBuffID(bossCheck, 117283) -- Cleansing Waters and TargetValidationMelee(bossCheck, PQ_IcyTouch) and TryPurge == true then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_IcyTouch), bossCheck) return true end
elseif npcID == 62511 or npcID == 62711 then --Amber-Shaper Un'sok or Amber Monstrosity local reshapeLife = UnitDebuffID("player", 122370)
if reshapeLife then local playerCasting = UnitCastingInfo("player") --grab spell names for abilities: local amberExplosion = GetSpellInfo(122402)
--interrupt self if casting amber explosion if playerCasting == amberExplosion then --Press the 2nd button (Struggle for Control) RunMacroText("/click "..PQR_OverrideActionBarButton2) return true end
--interrupt the target if casting amber explosion if bossCasting and bossCasting == amberExplosion then TargetUnit(bossCheck) --Press the 1st button (Amber Strike) RunMacroText("/click "..PQR_OverrideActionBarButton1) return true end
if UnitExists("boss2") then if bossCheck == "boss2" then return true --prevent the rotation from executing while reshaped end else return true end
end
if UnitBuffID("target", 122540) then -- Amber Carapace return true end
elseif npcID == 60709 then --Spirit Kings: Qiang. (Impervious Shield) --Stop all attacks until 0.2 seconds after cast time ends and until buff (Impervious Shield) is gone.
--only continue checking if we are targetting the boss or have no target. if (not UnitExists("target")) or (UnitIsUnit("target", bossCheck)) or (cleaveClass or isAOE) then local impName = GetSpellInfo(117961) local impShieldBuff = UnitBuffID(bossCheck, 117961)
if (bossCasting and bossCasting == impName) then local delayAdd = (castEnd/1000) - GetTime() --the number of seconds remaining on the cast. if (delayAdd <= 0.5) then StopAttack() SpellStopCasting() PQR_resumeAttack = GetTime() + delayAdd + 0.2 return true end return false end
if impShieldBuff then StopAttack() SpellStopCasting() return true end end
elseif npcID == 60710 then --Spirit Kings: Subetai. (Sleight of Hand) --Stop all attacks when casting Sleight of Hand, and until 0.2 seconds after cast time ends. --Also stop attacks if not stunned.
--only continue checking if we are targetting the boss or have no target. if (not UnitExists("target")) or (UnitIsUnit("target", bossCheck)) or (cleaveClass or isAOE) then local sleightName = GetSpellInfo(118162) local sleightBuff = UnitBuffID(bossCheck, 118162) -- HoJ, FoJ, Kidney local stunList = { 853, 105593, 408 } local isStunned = nil for _,v in ipairs(stunList) do local debuffCheck = UnitDebuffID(bossCheck, v) if debuffCheck then isStunned = true break end end
if (bossCasting and bossCasting == sleightName) then local delayAdd = (castEnd/1000) - GetTime() --the number of seconds remaining on the cast. if (delayAdd <= 0.5) then StopAttack() SpellStopCasting() PQR_resumeAttack = GetTime() + delayAdd + 0.2 return true end return false end
if sleightBuff and not isStunned then StopAttack() SpellStopCasting() return true end end
elseif npcID == 60701 then --Spirit Kings: Zian. (Shield of Darkness) --Stop all attacks until 0.5 seconds after cast time ends and until buff (Shield of Darkness) is gone.
if (not UnitExists("target")) or (UnitIsUnit("target", bossCheck)) or (cleaveClass or isAOE) then local sodName = GetSpellInfo(117697) local sodBuff = UnitBuffID(bossCheck, 117697)
if (bossCasting and bossCasting == sodName) then local delayAdd = (castEnd/1000) - GetTime() --the number of seconds remaining on the cast. if (delayAdd <= 0.5) then StopAttack() SpellStopCasting() PQR_resumeAttack = GetTime() + delayAdd + 0.4 return true end return false end
if sodBuff then StopAttack() SpellStopCasting() return true end end end end end
local returnSoul = select(7 ,UnitDebuffID("player", 116161)) if returnSoul and returnSoul - GetTime() <= 2 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end

Ability.Name: Plague Leech (BP < 1 or FF < 1)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_PlagueLeech = PQ_PlagueLeech local PQ_FrostFever = PQ_FrostFever local PQ_BloodPlague = PQ_BloodPlague local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
if PQ_CanCast == false then return false end if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_PlagueLeech) then return false end if FullyDepleted == 0 or not IsSpellKnown(PQ_PlagueLeech) then return false end
local FF,_,_,_,_,_,FFtimer = UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_FrostFever,"player") local BP,_,_,_,_,_,BPtimer = UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_BloodPlague,"player")
if FF and BP then if (BPtimer - GetTime() < 1.3 or FFtimer - GetTime() < 1.3) and TargetValidation("target", PQ_PlagueLeech) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_PlagueLeech), "target") return true end end

Ability.Name: Outbreak (no BP or no FF)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_FrostFever = PQ_FrostFever local PQ_BloodPlague = PQ_BloodPlague local PQ_Outbreak = PQ_Outbreak local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
if PQ_CanCast == false then return false end
local FF,_,_,_,_,_,FFtimer = UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_FrostFever,"player") local BP,_,_,_,_,_,BPtimer = UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_BloodPlague,"player")
if not BP or not FF then if TargetValidation("target", PQ_Outbreak) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_Outbreak), "target") PQ_ShouldPestilence = true return true end end

Ability.Name: Blood Tap (KM)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_BloodCharge = PQ_BloodCharge local PQ_KillingMachine = PQ_KillingMachine local PQ_BloodTap = PQ_BloodTap local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
if FullyDepleted == 0 or not IsSpellKnown(PQ_BloodTap) then return false end
local charges = select(4, UnitBuffID("player", PQ_BloodCharge))
if PQ_CanBT and charges and charges >= 5 and UnitBuffID("player", PQ_KillingMachine) then PQ_BTCD = GetTime() + 0.1 PQ_CanBT = false CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_BloodTap), "player") return true end

Ability.Name: Obliterate (KM)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_Obliterate = PQ_Obliterate local PQ_KillingMachine = PQ_KillingMachine local TargetValidationMelee = TargetValidationMelee
if PQ_CanCast and UnitBuffID("player", PQ_KillingMachine) and TargetValidationMelee("target", PQ_Obliterate) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_Obliterate), "target") return true end

Ability.Name: Unholy Blight (no BP or no FF)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_FrostFever = PQ_FrostFever local PQ_BloodPlague = PQ_BloodPlague local PQ_UnholyBlight = PQ_UnholyBlight local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
if PQ_CanCast == false or not IsSpellKnown(PQ_UnholyBlight) then return false end
local FF,_,_,_,_,_,FFtimer = UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_FrostFever,"player") local BP,_,_,_,_,_,BPtimer = UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_BloodPlague,"player")
if not BP or not FF then if TargetValidation("target", PQ_UnholyBlight) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_UnholyBlight), "player") PQ_ShouldPestilence = false return true end end

Ability.Name: Blood Tap (>10 and RP > 76)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_BloodCharge = PQ_BloodCharge local PQ_KillingMachine = PQ_KillingMachine local PQ_BloodTap = PQ_BloodTap local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
if FullyDepleted == 0 or not IsSpellKnown(PQ_BloodTap) then return false end
local charges = select(4, UnitBuffID("player", PQ_BloodCharge))
if PQ_CanBT and charges and charges > 10 and RunicPower > 76 then PQ_BTCD = GetTime() + 0.1 PQ_CanBT = false CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_BloodTap), "player") return true end

Ability.Name: Obliterate (Blood = 2 or Frost = 2 or Unholy = 2)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_Obliterate = PQ_Obliterate local TargetValidationMelee = TargetValidationMelee
if PQ_CanCast and (BloodRunes == 2 or FrostRuens == 2 or UnholyRunes == 2) and TargetValidationMelee("target", PQ_Obliterate) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_Obliterate), "target") return true end

Ability.Name: Unholy Blight
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_FrostFever = PQ_FrostFever local PQ_BloodPlague = PQ_BloodPlague local PQ_UnholyBlight = PQ_UnholyBlight local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
if PQ_CanCast == false or not IsSpellKnown(PQ_UnholyBlight) then return false end
local FF,_,_,_,_,_,FFtimer = UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_FrostFever,"player") local BP,_,_,_,_,_,BPtimer = UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_BloodPlague,"player")
if BP and FF then if (FFtimer - GetTime() < 3 or BPtimer - GetTime() < 3) and TargetValidation("target", PQ_UnholyBlight) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_UnholyBlight), "target") PQ_ShouldPestilence = false return true end else if TargetValidation("target", PQ_UnholyBlight) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_UnholyBlight), "target") PQ_ShouldPestilence = false return true end end

Ability.Name: Plague Leech (BP < 3 or FF < 3)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_PlagueLeech = PQ_PlagueLeech local PQ_FrostFever = PQ_FrostFever local PQ_BloodPlague = PQ_BloodPlague local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
if PQ_CanCast == false then return false end if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_PlagueLeech) then return false end if FullyDepleted == 0 or not IsSpellKnown(PQ_PlagueLeech) then return false end
local FF,_,_,_,_,_,FFtimer = UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_FrostFever,"player") local BP,_,_,_,_,_,BPtimer = UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_BloodPlague,"player")
if FF and BP then if (BPtimer - GetTime() < 3 or FFtimer - GetTime() < 3) and TargetValidation("target", PQ_PlagueLeech) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_PlagueLeech), "target") return true end end

Ability.Name: Obliterate
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_Obliterate = PQ_Obliterate local TargetValidationMelee = TargetValidationMelee
if PQ_CanCast and TargetValidationMelee("target", PQ_Obliterate) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_Obliterate), "target") return true end

Ability.Name: Frost Strike
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_FrostStrike = PQ_FrostStrike local TargetValidationMelee = TargetValidationMelee
if PQ_CanCast and TargetValidationMelee("target", PQ_FrostStrike) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_FrostStrike), "target") return true end

Ability.Name: Blood Tap (>10 and RP >= 20)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_BloodCharge = PQ_BloodCharge local PQ_KillingMachine = PQ_KillingMachine local PQ_BloodTap = PQ_BloodTap local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
if FullyDepleted == 0 or not IsSpellKnown(PQ_BloodTap) then return false end
local charges = select(4, UnitBuffID("player", PQ_BloodCharge))
if PQ_CanBT and charges and charges > 10 and RunicPower >= 20 then PQ_BTCD = GetTime() + 0.1 PQ_CanBT = false CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_BloodTap), "player") return true end

Ability.Name: Frost Strike (BC <= 10)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_FrostStrike = PQ_FrostStrike local TargetValidationMelee = TargetValidationMelee
if not IsSpellKnown(PQ_BloodTap) then return false end
local charges = select(4, UnitBuffID("player", PQ_BloodCharge))
if PQ_CanCast and charges and charges <= 10 and TargetValidationMelee("target", PQ_FrostStrike) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_FrostStrike), "target") return true end

Ability.Name: Frost Strike (RE and Frost = 0)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_FrostStrike = PQ_FrostStrike local TargetValidationMelee = TargetValidationMelee
if not IsSpellKnown(PQ_RunicEmpowerment) then return false end
if PQ_CanCast and FrostRunes == 0 and TargetValidationMelee("target", PQ_FrostStrike) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_FrostStrike), "target") return true end

Ability.Name: Frost Strike (no RC)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_FrostStrike = PQ_FrostStrike local TargetValidationMelee = TargetValidationMelee
if not IsSpellKnown(PQ_RunicCorruption) then return false end
if PQ_CanCast and not UnitBuffID("player", PQ_RunicCorruptionBuff) and TargetValidationMelee("target", PQ_FrostStrike) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_FrostStrike), "target") return true end

Ability.Name: Healthstone
Ability.Lua:
if UseHealthstone ~= true then return false end local PlayerCombat = UnitAffectingCombat("player") if not PlayerCombat then return false end
local HealthFrame = tonumber(UseHealthstoneValue)
if GetItemCount(5512,false,true) >= 1 and PlayerHpPercentage <= HealthFrame and PQR_SpellAvailable(5512) and UnitAffectingCombat("player") and GetItemCooldown(5512) == 0 then UseItemByName(5512) return true end

Ability.Name: Anti Magic Zone
Ability.Lua: if UseAMZ == true then if UseAMZ and PQI:IsHotkeys(UseAMZKey) and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_AMZ) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_AMZ),"player") if SpellIsTargeting() then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end end

Ability.Name: Raise Ally
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_RaiseAlly = PQ_RaiseAlly if not UseRaiseAlly then return false end local v=UseRaiseAllyValue or 2
-- Don't try to cast if we're moving. if PQR_IsMoving(0.3) then return false end
-- Stop accessing if we're casting Raise Ally already. if UnitCastingInfo("player") == GetSpellInfo(PQ_RaiseAlly) then return false end
-- Battle Res. if IsInRaid() then group = "raid" elseif IsInGroup() then group = "party" else return false end
-- When we're in a party/raid with more than 1 member... if GetNumGroupMembers() > 0 then for i=1,GetNumGroupMembers() do local member = group..i
-- Stop out of combat if not UnitAffectingCombat("player") then return false end
if PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_RaiseAlly) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(PQ_RaiseAlly),member) == 1 then -- if not IsLineOfSight(member, 3) then return false end -- Soulstone: Raid if v == 1 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_RaiseAlly),member) return true end
-- Soulstone: Tanks & Healers if v == 2 then if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" or UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "HEALER" then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_RaiseAlly),member) return true end end end end end

Ability.Name: [Misc] PQI
Anti Magic Shell
Ability.Lua:
local HealthFrame = tonumber(UseAMSValue)
if UseAMS == true then if UseAMS and PlayerHp <= HealthFrame and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_AMS) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_AMS),"player") return true end end

Ability.Name: [Item] Potion
Ability.Lua:
local HealthFrame = tonumber(UsePotionsValue) local PlayerCombat = UnitAffectingCombat("player") if not PlayerCombat then return false end
if UsePotionBuff == true and PQI:IsHotkeys(UsePotionBuffKey) and GetItemCount(76095,false,true) > 0 -- Potion of Mogu Power and GetItemCooldown(76095) == 0 then UseItemByName(76095) end
local PlayerHp = PlayerHp if UsePotions == true and GetItemCount(76097,false,true) > 0 -- Master Healing Potion and PlayerHp < HealthFrame and GetItemCooldown(76097) == 0 then UseItemByName(76097) elseif UsePotions == true and GetItemCount(76094,false,true) > 0 -- Alchemist's Rejuvenation and PlayerHp < HealthFrame and GetItemCooldown(76094) == 0 then UseItemByName(76094) end

Ability.Name: [Item] Flask
Ability.Lua:
if UseFlask ~= true then return false end local PlayerCombat = UnitAffectingCombat("player") if not PlayerCombat then return false end
if UnitBuffID("player", 105696) ~= nil then return false end if GetItemCount(76088,false,true) > 0 -- Flask of Winter's Bite and GetItemCooldown(76088) == 0 then UseItemByName(76088) end

Ability.Name: [Item] Trinkets
Ability.Lua:
local PlayerCombat = UnitAffectingCombat("player") if not PlayerCombat then return false end
local PlayerHp = PlayerHp
-- [MISC] Trinkets if (UseTrinket1 ~= true and UseTrinket2 ~= true and UseGloves ~= true) then return false end
---------------- -- TRINKET 01 -- ---------------- local HealthFrame = tonumber(UseTrinket1Value) if UseTrinket1 == true and PlayerHp <= HealthFrame and GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(13) end
---------------- -- TRINKET 02 -- ---------------- local HealthFrame = tonumber(UseTrinket2Value) if UseTrinket2 == true and PlayerHp <= HealthFrame and GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",14) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(14) end
------------ -- GLOVES -- ------------ if UseGloves == true and GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",10) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(10) end

Ability.Name: [Tier] 6 Talent
Ability.Lua:
if not UseTier6Talent then return false end
if PQI:IsHotkeys(UseTier6TalentKey) then if PQR_SpellAvailable(108200) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(108200),"player") return true end if PQR_SpellAvailable(108199) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(108199),"player") return true end if PQR_SpellAvailable(108198) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(108198),"player") return true end end

Ability.Name: [Tier] 4 Talent
Ability.Lua:
if not UseTier4Talent then return false end local PlayerHp = PlayerHp local PQ_DeathPact = PQ_DeathPact local PQ_DeathSiphon = PQ_DeathSiphon local PQ_Conversion = PQ_Conversion local _,ghoul = GetTotemInfo(1) local HealthFrame = tonumber(UseTier4TalentValue)
if PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_DeathPact) and ghoul ~= nil and ghoul ~= "" and PlayerHp <= HealthFrame then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_DeathPact)) return true end if IsSpellKnown(108196) and PQR_SpellAvailable(108196) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(108196), "target") return true end if PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_Conversion) and RunicPower > 20 and not UnitBuffID("player", PQ_Conversion) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_Conversion)) return true end

Ability.Name: Death Pact
Ability.Lua:
if not UseTier4Talent then return false end local PlayerHp = PlayerHp local PQ_DeathPact = PQ_DeathPact local _,ghoul = GetTotemInfo(1) local HealthFrame = tonumber(UseTier4TalentValue)
if PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_DeathPact) and ghoul ~= nil and ghoul ~= "" and PlayerHp <= HealthFrame then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_DeathPact)) return true end
